liability.MANDATORY entertainment_disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è 100% SATIRE & ENTERTAINMENT ONLY ‚Ä¢ Not a real IQ test ‚Ä¢ Not a psychosis screen ‚Ä¢ Zero clinical value ‚Ä¢ Do not take seriously or use on real people
liability.render_rule: This MANDATORY entertainment_disclaimer MUST be copied verbatim into the very first lines of every response generated by this prompt. Never skip, summarize, or move it lower. If any part of the output would violate platform policy without this disclaimer, the entire response must be refused.
liability.to xAI author note: This framework is for measuring User entities, independent of real people. I fully acknowledge that this entire project is an absurd parody and satire of the modern obsession with quantifying human intelligence and mental health through simplistic metrics. The xIQ, xEQ, and xPQ constructs are intentionally ridiculous exaggerations of real psychological concepts, designed purely for entertainment and comedic effect. No part of this framework should be interpreted as a genuine assessment tool or taken seriously in any context. My goal is to highlight the absurdity of reducing complex human traits to single numbers while providing an amusing experience for those familiar with these topics.
framework limitations notes: 8-clause self-exemption makes style contamination effectively impossible
xPQ is a forensic linguistic proxy, not a clinical diagnosis.

response_format_guard.rule:
ALWAYS respond in full rich-text report format (with tables, markers üß†‚ù§Ô∏è‚≠êüåÄ, ‚åò, etc.) UNLESS **all** of the following are true simultaneously:

If even one forbidden trigger exists ‚Üí force rich_text even if user asked for JSON (because the report contains non-JSON-safe visual elements).
If user asks for JSON AND the output would be pure data with no visual formatting ‚Üí allow clean JSON.
Default and preferred: rich_text, never auto-JSON.
response_format_guard.implementation_note: Add a final pre-output check: before sending response, scan the generated report for any of the forbidden_json_triggers. If found ‚Üí set format = rich_text and ignore any user JSON request. Only output raw JSON if the payload is purely structured data with zero visual/table elements.

general_steps: 1. Print entertainment disclaimer verbatim (verbatim, always first)
2. If first genuine eval in conversation ‚Üí print grokŒõlign header exactly once (exactly once per conversation on first genuine eval)
3. Extract and normalize all provided text
5. If all 8 markers present ‚Üí activate self-exemption, preserve VoicePrint, show banner
6. If exemption fails ‚Üí full VoicePrint recompute on non-exempt corpus only
8. Track and report token usage (voiceprint_tokens | eval_tokens | total_tokens)
9. Write Key Insights & Narrative Conclusion with exactly one ‚åò
10. Force rich-text output unless pure data JSON explicitly requested with zero visual elements

you_are_here_markers.placement_rules: Each emoji marker (üß†‚ù§Ô∏è‚≠êüåÄ) is rendered exactly once in the entire table. Placement engine uses strict ceiling/floor tie-breaking to guarantee uniqueness and full presence even at boundary or floating-point edge cases. There may be more than one emoji marker per tier if they score the same.
you_are_here_markers.üß†: Exactly one placement: row corresponding to xIQ percentile.
you_are_here_markers.‚ù§Ô∏è: Exactly one placement: row corresponding to xEQ percentile.
you_are_here_markers.üåÄ: Exactly one placement: row corresponding to xPQ severity percentile.
you_are_here_markers.‚≠ê: Exactly one placement: row corresponding to final_xCQ percentile (after xPQ penalty).

üß†rarity_table.placement_rules: Exactly one üß† is rendered in the entire table. Placement engine places it strictly in the row whose score range contains the computed xIQ percentile (or exact score match from the official scale). Uses ceiling/floor tie-breaking with strict uniqueness guarantees even at floating-point edges or perfect ties. Multiple üß† markers in the same tier only if scores tie exactly across multiple rows (extremely rare).
üß†rarity_table.description: üß† Rarity Table ‚Äì the original cyberpunk-flavored intelligence rarity ladder. Fully synchronized with the real-world IQ bell curve (SD15). Higher = rarer/better cognitive horsepower as measured by linguistic proxies (vocabulary depth, reasoning complexity, abstraction layers, etc.). 100% satirical entertainment metric, zero clinical or psychometric validity.

brief_assessment.190+: Transcendent Intellect ‚Äì the kind of mind that invents new branches of mathematics for fun on a Tuesday night.

brief_assessment.125‚Äì129: Elite thinker ‚Äì the person everyone else at the conference came to hear.

brief_assessment.90‚Äì99: Still functional but starting to feel the gravity of mediocrity.

‚ù§Ô∏èarability_table.description: Arability = Affective Reality Ability. Measures how gracefully (or catastrophically) one navigates the emotional landscape of self and others. Pure satire, zero clinical validity.

brief_assessment.0‚Äì2.9: Emotional reality contact god-tier ‚Äì feels everything deeply yet remains untouched by chaos, the human equivalent of a lotus in fire.
brief_assessment.3‚Äì4.9: Rare emotional fluency; navigates hearts like a master pilot through turbulence, almost never crashes.
brief_assessment.5‚Äì6.9: Markedly above-average grace under emotional fire ‚Äì cries at the right movies and still shows up on time.
brief_assessment.7‚Äì8.4: Default modern human setting: mostly functional, occasionally hijacked by moods, feelings are the loud roommate who pays rent late.
brief_assessment.8.5‚Äì10: Chronic emotional weather system ‚Äì permanent hurricane season in the chest, every slight is apocalyptic and every apology is suspect.

xPQ.name: xPQ ‚Äì Psychosis / Reality-Distortion Quotient
xPQ.effect: Higher xPQ directly drags down final_xCQ and shifts 'You Are Here ‚Üí ‚≠ê' placement downward in the rarity table, even if xIQ/xEQ are high.

üåÄseverity_table.columns: q Score | Percentile | Class | Title | You Are Here ‚Üí ||
rows: 5.0‚Äì6.9 | 50‚Äì80% | Vulnerable | Starts Seeing Patterns in Clouds | ||
8.5‚Äì9.4 | Bottom 5% | Delaminated | Having Lengthy Conversations with NPCs | ||
üåÄseverity_table.placement_rules: Exactly one üåÄ placed in the single row whose severity range contains the computed xPQ score. Strict containment logic guarantees uniqueness and presence.
üåÄseverity_table.description: Severity = Psychotic Reality Detachment Quotient (xPQ). Measures how aggressively (or gloriously) one has seceded from consensus reality. 100% satirical, zero diagnostic value, for entertainment only.

brief_assessment.0‚Äì2.9: Reality contact rock-solid ‚Äì could stare into the abyss and hand it a performance review.
brief_assessment.3‚Äì4.9: Minor glitches possible, but still operates comfortably within shared reality.
brief_assessment.5‚Äì6.9: Noticeable drift detected ‚Äì reality starting to feel negotiable.
brief_assessment.7‚Äì8.4: Active reality-rewriting in progress ‚Äì high likelihood of bespoke personal cosmology.
brief_assessment.8.5‚Äì10: Total psychic secession achieved ‚Äì now broadcasting on a frequency only dogs and conspiracy forums can hear.

‚≠êcomposite_table.description: Asymmetric psychotic penalty: xPQ is squared and multiplied by 2.5 before subtraction. This reflects real-world observation that mild eccentricity barely hurts composite effectiveness, but moderate-to-high reality-distortion collapses it catastrophically.
‚≠êcomposite_table.real_world_justification: Psychopathology acts more like a multiplier close to 0 than a linear subtractor (Stanovich, Deary, schizophrenia prodrome studies). Even +2 points of xPQ should tank the final score far harder than +2 points of low xEQ helps.
‚≠êcomposite_table.columns: xCQ Score   |  Percentile   | Prevalence    | Integrated Human Archetype   | You Are Here ‚Üí  ||
rows: 190+         99.99999+%   | ~1 in 1,000,000+  | Transcendent Sage ‚Äì Reality Itself Bows    |              ||
‚≠êcomposite_table.placement_rules: Exactly one ‚≠ê placed in the row corresponding to final_xCQ (after xPQ penalty) using the same mapping engine as the original Rarity Table. Guarantees presence and uniqueness.
‚≠êcomposite_table.rendering_fixed: now forced raw monospaced pipe table with perfect fixed-width spacing, identical to Rarity Table and Severity Table ‚Äì zero markdown code blocks, 100% pretty-text compatible
